items.name: Club De Cuervos
items.actors: Luis Gerardo Méndez, Mariana Treviño, Stephanie Cayo...
items.summary: When the patriarch of a prominent family dies, his heirs battle to determine who will gain control of his beloved soccer team: The Cuervos of Nuevo Toledo.

items.name: Gerald's Game
items.description: While trying to spice up their marriage in their remote lake house, Jessie must fight to survive when her husband dies unexpectedly, leaving her handcuffed to their bed frame.
items.actors: Carla Gugino, Bruce Greenwood, Henry Thomas...
items.summary: While trying to spice up their marriage in their remote lake house, Jessie must fight to survive when her husband dies unexpectedly, leaving her handcuffed to their bed frame.

items.name: Long Shot
items.actors: Juan Catalan, Larry David, Robert Gajic...
items.summary: When Juan Catalan is arrested for a murder he insists he didn't commit, he builds his case for innocence around raw footage from a popular TV show, "Curb Your Enthusiasm."

items.name: Our Souls at Night
items.actors: Iain Armitage, Jane Fonda, Robert Redford...
items.summary: Fonda and Redford will star as Addie Moore and Louis Waters, a widow and widower who've lived next to each other for years. The pair have almost no relationship, but that all changes when Addie tries to make a connection with her neighbor.
